endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all available insurance policies their details and coverage options.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific insurance policy using its identifier.
Obtain a list of the various insurance policy categories offered by the service.
Submit policy details to receive calculated premium estimates for evaluation.
Fetch a list of items or conditions covered under a specific insurance policy.
Submit the required user information to enroll in a selected insurance policy.
Cancel an existing subscription or enrollment in a specific insurance policy using its subscription ID.
Retrieve a list of insurance providers applicable for a specific policy.
Update or modify details of a specific insurance policy, such as coverage or duration.
View claim history and status for policies associated with a user account.
